scripts.build-project-list-dev: node build.js src/project-list-RHQ/index.ts dist/project_list_index_dev.js && rsync -avrz dist/project_list_index_dev.js ~/Dropbox/panasonic_kintone/dev && cp dist/index.css ~/Dropbox/panasonic_kintone
scripts.build-project-list-prod: node build.js src/project-list-RHQ/index.ts dist/project_list_index_prod.js --prod && rsync -avrz dist/project_list_index_prod.js ~/Dropbox/panasonic_kintone/prod
scripts.build-exchange-rate-dev: node build.js src/exchange-rate/index.ts dist/exchange_rate_index_dev.js && rsync -avrz  dist/exchange_rate_index_dev.js ~/Dropbox/panasonic_kintone/dev
scripts.build-exchange-rate-prod: node build.js src/exchange-rate/index.ts dist/exchange_rate_index_prd.js --prod && rsync -avrz  dist/exchange_rate_index_prod.js ~/Dropbox/panasonic_kintone/prod
